AssociateAdminAccount.name: AssociateAdminAccount
AssociateAdminAccount.description:
Grants permission to set the AWS Firewall Manager administrator account and enables
                                                the service in all organization accounts

DeleteAppsList.name: DeleteAppsList
DeleteAppsList.description: Grants permission to permanently deletes an AWS Firewall Manager applications list

DeleteNotificationChannel.name: DeleteNotificationChannel
DeleteNotificationChannel.description:
Grants permission to delete an AWS Firewall Manager association with the IAM role
                                                and the Amazon Simple Notification Service (SNS) topic that is used to notify the
                                                FM administrator about major FM events and errors across the organization

DeletePolicy.name: DeletePolicy
DeletePolicy.description: Grants permission to permanently delete an AWS Firewall Manager policy

DeleteProtocolsList.name: DeleteProtocolsList
DeleteProtocolsList.description: Grants permission to permanently deletes an AWS Firewall Manager protocols list

DisassociateAdminAccount.name: DisassociateAdminAccount
DisassociateAdminAccount.description:
Grants permission to disassociate the account that has been set as the AWS Firewall
                                                Manager administrator account and and disables the service in all organization accounts

GetAdminAccount.name: GetAdminAccount
GetAdminAccount.description:
Grants permission to retrieve the AWS Organizations master account that is associated
                                                with AWS Firewall Manager as the AWS Firewall Manager administrator

GetAppsList.name: GetAppsList
GetAppsList.description:
Grants permission to return information about the specified AWS Firewall Manager applications
                                                list

GetComplianceDetail.name: GetComplianceDetail
GetComplianceDetail.description:
Grants permission to retrieve detailed compliance information about the specified
                                                member account. Details include resources that are in and out of compliance with the
                                                specified policy

GetNotificationChannel.name: GetNotificationChannel
GetNotificationChannel.description:
Grants permission to retrieve information about the Amazon Simple Notification Service
                                                (SNS) topic that is used to record AWS Firewall Manager SNS logs

GetPolicy.name: GetPolicy
GetPolicy.description:
Grants permission to retrieve information about the specified AWS Firewall Manager
                                                policy

GetProtectionStatus.name: GetProtectionStatus
GetProtectionStatus.description:
Grants permission to retrieve policy-level attack summary information in the event
                                                of a potential DDoS attack

GetProtocolsList.name: GetProtocolsList
GetProtocolsList.description:
Grants permission to return information about the specified AWS Firewall Manager protocols
                                                list

GetViolationDetails.name: GetViolationDetails
GetViolationDetails.description:
Grants permission to retrieve violations for a resource based on the specified AWS
                                                Firewall Manager policy and AWS account

ListAppsLists.name: ListAppsLists
ListAppsLists.description: Grants permission to return an array of AppsListDataSummary objects

ListComplianceStatus.name: ListComplianceStatus
ListComplianceStatus.description:
Grants permission to retrieve an array of PolicyComplianceStatus objects in the response.
                                                Use PolicyComplianceStatus to get a summary of which member accounts are protected
                                                by the specified policy

ListMemberAccounts.name: ListMemberAccounts
ListMemberAccounts.description:
Grants permission to retrieve an array of member account ids if the caller is FMS
                                                admin account

ListPolicies.name: ListPolicies
ListPolicies.description: Grants permission to retrieve an array of PolicySummary objects in the response

ListProtocolsLists.name: ListProtocolsLists
ListProtocolsLists.description: Grants permission to return an array of ProtocolsListDataSummary objects

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to list Tags for a given resource

PutAppsList.name: PutAppsList
PutAppsList.description: Grants permission to create an AWS Firewall Manager applications list

PutNotificationChannel.name: PutNotificationChannel
PutNotificationChannel.description:
Grants permission to designate the IAM role and Amazon Simple Notification Service
                                                (SNS) topic that AWS Firewall Manager (FM) could use to notify the FM administrator
                                                about major FM events and errors across the organization

PutPolicy.name: PutPolicy
PutPolicy.description: Grants permission to create an AWS Firewall Manager policy

PutProtocolsList.name: PutProtocolsList
PutProtocolsList.description: Grants permission to creates an AWS Firewall Manager protocols list

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to add a Tag to a given resource

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to remove a Tag from a given resource
